title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Anza Trail Vistas, San Juan Bautista, CA   8 Photos  San Juan Bautista, CA, in San Benito County is home to a premier 2-mile recreation trail segment of the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail. Photo Credit: NPS / Â© Bhoj Rai           Las Posadas Holiday Programs, Martinez, CA   15 Photos  The Anza Trail exhibit at the John Muir National Historic Site in Martinez, CA, lights up every holiday season. Volunteers organize Las Posadas, a Christmas-time event that evokes the faith and traditions resulting from the blend of Spanish and Native cultures in 16th century New Spain.          Presidio of San Francisco Commemorations   15 Photos  Every June, descendants of the Anza Expedition families commemorate their ancestors' June 27, 1776, arrival to San Francisco Bay and the founding of the Presidio of San Francisco.
